answers.answer: This is Raynaud's Phenomenon. It can occur alone, or as part of a systemmic disease. It is not that rare. Here is a link:http://www.niams.nih.gov/hi/topics/raynaud/ar125fs.htm

question: Hello,I have been having this problem for about 6 months now where even if it is hot my feet and palms and nose are extremely cold and sometimes painful. I have done many tests such as diabetes and other blood tests.  Nothing was found however i am concerned about these symptoms and I have no clue what they are from.  The only thing that they found on the blood test was a bit cholosterol but i went on a certain diet given to me by a dietician and the cholosterol has gone down but the symptoms still remain.  Do you have any clue what it could be? this is very frustrating that out of the many doctors i went to noone was able to find anything.Thank You
title: feet, hands, nose cold even when its hot and sometimes pain
